Country: Cook Islands (self-governing country in free association with New Zealand)
Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha (UK)
Niue (self-governing state in free association with New Zealand)
Paracel Islands (disputed territory) ( Vietnam, until 1974) (occupied by China since 1974, also claimed by Republic of China (Taiwan) and Vietnam)
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands (UK)
Spratly Islands (disputed territory) (partially occupied by six countries - China; Republic of China (Taiwan); Philippines; Malaysia; Vietnam and Brunei)
Western Sahara (disputed territory between Morocco and the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic) ("Free Zone" is a self proclaimed and de facto sovereign state)
